name: Legion of Super Heroes: Timber Wolf Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: When the Legion first meet Timber Wolf, he operates under a different code name.  What is it?
options: He didn't have a code name
questions.explanation:
Lone Wolf.

	Lone Wolf was introduced in 'Adventure Comics' #327 (1964).  The story ends with him stating, "I never want to be a Lone Wolf again."  In his next appearance, he is called Timber Wolf.

questions.text: Between the time when he initially met the Legion and when he finally joins the Legion, where has Timber Wolf been?
questions.correct: He's been a student attending the Legion Academy.
options: He's been operating as a super hero on his home world.
No backstory is given for the gap in time.
He's been a body guard for Legion financier R.J. Brande.
questions.explanation:
He's been a student attending the Legion Academy.

	Timber Wolf has been attending the Legion Academy, training to become a full time member of Legion of Super Heroes.  He and fellow Academy member Chemical King are recruited to assist the Legion infiltrate the Legion of Super Villains.  Upon completion of the adventure, they are both granted full membership.

questions.text: What is Timber Wolf's real name?
questions.explanation:
Brin Lando.

	When the Legion first meet Brin, his mind has been wiped and he believes himself to be the android called Karth Arn.  The Legion assists him in regaining his real memories.

questions.text: In original Legion continuity, what is Timber Wolf's home planet?
questions.explanation:
Zoon.

	Zoon (later spelled Zuun) is a mining planet.  After years of abusive mining, the world's water and atmosphere have been almost completely destroyed.

questions.text: Timber Wolf fell in love with one of this fellow Legionnaires and dated her for many years during the Legion's early adventures.  Which Legionnaire was it?
questions.explanation:
Light Lass.

	Light Lass fell for Brin when he was still Lone Wolf.  Their romance continued after he joined the Legion.

questions.text: At the behest of which fallen Legionnaire did Timber Wolf travel all the way to the planet Lythyl in order to plant a seed?
questions.explanation:
Karate Kid.

	Karate Kid left a request in his last will and testament that Timber Wolf accomplish this task.

questions.text: Which of the following is NOT one of Timber Wolf's super powers?
questions.explanation:
Invulnerability.

	Though he does have enhanced healing capabilities, Timber Wolf is not invulnerable.

questions.text: In the early days of the 5YL (5 Year Later) continuity, Timber Wolf is now further mutated and is residing on Rimbor with Ultra Boy.  What name was given to him at this time?
questions.explanation:
Furball.

	Furball is a part of Jo's (Ultra Boy's) smuggling and pirate gang.  He is very protective of its members and provides muscle.  He is completely covered in fur now.  At first, none of Furball's former comrades know that he is actually their friend Timber Wolf.

questions.text: In the Post Zero Hour/Reboot continuity, Timber Wolf resides on Rimbor and is a rival gang leader to Ultra Boy's Emerald Dragon gang.  What is the name of Timber Wolf's gang?
questions.explanation:
The Lone Wolves.

	In this continuity, Brin becomes very protective of fellow Legionnaire Apparition during her pregnancy and after she gives birth, while Ultra Boy is lost in space with several fellow Legionnaires ('Legion Lost' vol.1 2000/2001).

questions.text: In the "RetroBoot"/New 52 Legion continuity, Timber Wolf acquires a new power after being exposed to "mutagen" while lost in the past. What new ability is added to his existing powers?
questions.correct: His fingernails become hardened sharp talons he can eject
options: He can release a pungent musk odor, causing others to choke
His ears can extend and allow him to hear on a spectrum outside the human norm
His eyes can grow a second set of opaque lids allowing him to see in the dark
questions.explanation:
His fingernails become hardened sharp talons he can eject.

	Ejecting these hardened nails causes him some temporary pain, and new nails grow back almost immediately.  ('Legion Lost' vol.2 2012/2013)
